We can use:
•general purpose search engines (e.g. Google );
•search engines for ontologies (e.g. Swoogle and Watson );
•repositories (e.g. Protégé ontology library  and the Open Biological and Biomedical Ontologies );
•known ontologies (for instance, mereology terms can be reused from Dolce-Lite , SUMO-OWL , etc.).
speaker: SYSTEM
